sentence.Network_en: Deficiency syndrome of Kidney Yang involves the dysfunction of Hypothalamic - Pituitary - target gland axis.
sentence.Network_cn: 肾阳虚证下丘脑 - 垂体 - 靶腺(肾上腺、甲状腺、性腺及胸腺)轴的功能紊乱.

sentence.Network_en: Prolactin - easing peptide ( PrRP ) was found to be a novel bioactive hypothalamic neuropeptide.
sentence.Network_cn: 催乳素释放肽 ( PrRP ) 是一种新的下丘脑活性神经肽.

sentence.Network_en: Results All the patients had no hypothalamic or pituitary dysfunction.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果全部患者均康复,无下丘脑或垂体功能障碍.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the cortex and the hypothalamus

auth_sentence.content: The cortico-thalamic axis of Crick and Koch is too narrow an explanation of complexity to warrant investing on it.
auth_sentence.res_content: The cortico-thalamic axis of Crick and Koch is too narrow an explanation of complexity to warrant investing on it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The cortico-thalamic axis of Crick and Koch is too narrow an explanation of complexity to warrant investing on it.

auth_sentence.content: The study involved young women with extremely low body fat and a condition called hypothalamic amenorrhea.
